DOC.brief_summary: This study special drug use investigation program NUCALA ( brand name Mepolizumab ) administer subcutaneously ( SC ) . In study information regard safety effectiveness long term use NUCALA subcutaneous injection collect Asthma subject daily clinical practice . The observation period per subject 52 week initiation NUCALA treatment follow-up investigation 2 year observation period . NUCALA register trademark GlaxoSmithKline [ GSK ] group company
DOC.brief_title: Long Term Special Drug Use Investigation Mepolizumab
DOC.criteria: Subjects receive NUCALA first time treatment bronchial asthma ( refractory asthma whose symptom inadequately control despite receive standard asthma medication ) No exclusion criterion
